translations: 欺骗；使失望（delude 的过去分词）

sentences.sentence: Don't be deluded into thinking that we are out of danger yet.
sentences.translation: 不要误以为我们已脱离危险。

sentences.sentence: Yoga can reduce stress levels. But anyone who thinks they are going to get in shape sitting in the lotus position or any other pose is deluded.
sentences.translation: 瑜伽可以减轻压力。但是，任何认为自己能以莲花坐姿或其他任何姿势塑身的人都是在自欺欺人。

sentences.sentence: He deluded everyone into following him.
